title: Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 339 of 2020) (as
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Wildlife (Wild Birds) (Open Seasons)
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Wildlife (Wild Birds) (Open Seasons) 

(Amendment) Order 2023. 

(2) The Wildlife (Wild Birds) (Open Seasons) Orders 1979 to 2012 and this 
Order may be cited together as the Wildlife (Wild Birds) (Open Seasons) Orders 
1979 to 2023.

title: Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 339 of 2020) (as
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The effect of this Order is to amend the Open Seasons list of huntable species of 
wild birds by removing the Goldeneye, Pintail, Pochard and Scaup from the list.
